Experience Technical Specialist Google July 2015  – Present (2 months) Greater Detroit Area Consumer Operations, Customer Service Quality Specialist Google December 2013  –  July 2015  (1 year 8 months) San Francisco Bay Area -Built a global customer support quality assurance program, driving consistency and continuous improvement across phone, email and chat contact channels. 
-Improved key performance indicators for our customer service centers by working with our vendor partners to understand and utilize the quality control program effectively, and teach them how to identify and address areas for improvement. 
-Performed deep dives on agent quality errors and customer dissatisfaction topics to identify root causes then project manage the execution of the corrective actions. 
-Audit customer service interactions from our third party Customer Service centers.

-Analyze and monitor key user and operational metrics to help drive improvements to our product and support offerings. Adwords Account Strategist Google November 2009  –  July 2013  (3 years 9 months) Ann Arbor, MI • Led 15 individuals on the Quality Assurance and Customer Satisfaction team. Ensured team members followed quality guidelines when reviewing customer service interactions with advertisers through routine audits. 
• Assisted in the creation and maintenance of the quality and customer satisfaction criteria followed by customer service agents. 
• Communicated individual and team performance metrics to upper management with recommendations of how to improve customer service. 
• Coached 9-15 customer service representatives throughout the quarter on the quality of their calls and the customer satisfaction data left by advertisers. 
• Collaborated across office with counterparts in India and Dublin for consistency in customer service and guidelines globally. 
• Developed and implemented trainings to new Quality team members each quarter. 
• Contributed feedback and personal experience to G2G team in implementation of customer service trainings provided to all of SMB customer service Googlers. Co-led these customer service trainings twice a quarter to groups of 12-20 individuals.  
• Provided advertising support and troubleshooting to small and medium businesses via phone, chat, and email.
